comment: So, there is your unbiased Big Tech. Big Tech, Big Lie. Go Gab! next big thing? An unbiased search engine?
amr:
# ::snt So, there is your unbiased Big Tech. Big Tech, Big Lie. Go Gab! next big thing? An unbiased search engine?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / company
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Big"
                  :op2 "Tech")
            :poss (y / you)
            :ARG1-of (b / bias-01
                  :polarity -))
      :snt2 (c2 / company
            :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Big"
                  :op2 "Lie")
            :poss y)
      :snt3 (g / go-03
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 y)
      :ARG1 (t / thing
            :mod (b2 / big)
            :mod (n3 / next))
      :snt4 (s / search-engine
            :ARG1-of (b3 / bias-01
                  :polarity -)
            :polarity (a / amr-unknown)))
